relation: Great for these types of students
The Campus is very cautious. You must have an school Id on you at all times, and your Id is the only way you can be scanned into your classes.
Any students needing to work, or take care of a family outside of school, Brown Mackie College is perfect. With one course a month and 3 4hr classes a week, who can beat that?

With Student advisors that you can call anytime and they will call you back that day, and are extremely friendly and helpful, I have not found another school that offers anything better. I look forward to starting in January and getting my degree quickly and easily.
There is a small lunch area to study and relax.
There is free tutoring and a library open throughout the week for students.

Look around and find the college that suits you best. Brown Mackie College has very helpful people working with you, and a great class schedule so you can take care of your family and or work outside of school.

Brown Mackie College has the most helpful, friendly people working here. They have time for all your questions, either on the phone or in person. They work for you and with you on all concerns that come up.
